mapper.select: SELECT count( * ) AS value, de.`name` as name FROM eco_enterprise co join eco_code de on co.enterprise_nature_code = de.code_id WHERE co.delete_flag = '0' and co.administrative_division = #{administrativeDivision} and co.country = #{country} GROUP BY co.enterprise_nature_code

SELECT COUNT(*) as num, de.`name` as enterpriseNatureName, en.enterprise_nature_code, EXTRACT( YEAR FROM en.registered_time ) as year FROM eco_enterprise en join eco_code de on en.enterprise_nature_code = de.code_id and en.enterprise_nature_code = #{codeId} WHERE EXTRACT( YEAR FROM en.registered_time ) > year(now()) - 5 and en.administrative_division = #{administrativeDivision} and en.country = #{country} GROUP BY en.enterprise_nature_code,EXTRACT( YEAR FROM en.registered_time ) ORDER BY EXTRACT( YEAR FROM en.registered_time ) ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eco_enterprise t1 WHERE t1.delete_flag = '0' and ( SELECT count( * ) FROM eco_envprotection t2 WHERE t1.enterprise_id = t2.enterprise_id AND t2.delete_flag = '0' ) > 0 and t1.administrative_division = #{administrativeDivision} and t1.country = #{country}

SELECT fi.equipment_id, fi.equipment_name, fi.effect_time, fi.enterprise_id, en.enterprise_name FROM eco_enterprise en JOIN eco_firedevice fi ON fi.enterprise_id = en.enterprise_id AND fi.delete_flag = '0' WHERE DATE_FORMAT(fi.effect_time,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT( SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND en.delete_flag = '0' and en.administrative_division = #{administrativeDivision} and en.country = #{country}

SELECT en.enterprise_id, en.enterprise_name, dan.danger_source_name FROM eco_enterprise en JOIN eco_dangersource dan ON en.enterprise_id = dan.enterprise_id AND dan.delete_flag = '0' WHERE en.delete_flag = '0' and en.administrative_division = #{administrativeDivision} and en.country = #{country}
